name: WFO World Football Online
description:
WFO World Football Online is an online football management game with a non-scripted match engine on a virtual football world continuously developed by AI.

Footballers will grow up and retire in this time-free simulation.
In every occasion, you have a chance to drop cards to use them on your footballers to create super stars.

Gameplay features

  • Unique football world experience. WFO artificial intelligence generates the all of the footballers with their past and the future on the cloud server.
  • Non-scripted physic based realistic match engine offers 3D and super fast 2D render modes.
  • AI generated scout system to generate footballers.
  • Live transfer market to buy/sell footballers.
  • Lighter management, more enjoyment.
  • Lots of in-game cards to develop your footballers.
  • Cross play support on the available platforms by linking your Steam account.

Requires internet connection to play.
We don't collect any data from players.
